Historic national squash teams’ title win to Gisborne’s Surf City https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/10/historic-national-squash-teams-title-win-to-gisbornes-surf-city/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/10/historic-national-squash-teams-title-win-to-gisbornes-surf-city/ John Gillies'We have established ourselves as one of the top clubs in New Zealand, if not the top.' Wed, 09 Oct 2024 23:18:24 +0000 Surf City Squash Club men’s B Grade team members with the Davis Trophy presented to them as winners of the National SuperChamps B Grade tournament in Whangārei. They are, back (from left): Mike Low and Willz Donnelly (coach). Front: Chapman Kutia, Torin Donnelly, Matthew Ross, Tohe Wanoa, Jacque Davis and Tom Harbott.
